name: Leaving Google
title: Leaving Google has actively improved my life (Score: 224 pts in 3 hours)
body: The author left Google due to its declining search quality and introduction of AI-powered features in Gmail, and found improved digital hygiene, fun internet searching, and a cleaner conscience. Link: pseudosingleton.com/leaving-google-improved-my-life/ Comments: news.ycombinator.com/item?id=47184288

name: Passkeys encryption warning
title: Please stop using passkeys for encrypting user data (Score: 17 pts in 3 hours)
body: Using passkeys for encrypting user data is a disaster waiting to happen, as it creates a large blast radius for losing sensitive information. Link: blog.timcappalli.me/p/passkeys-prf-warning/ Comments: lobste.rs/s/tf8j5h/please_stop_using_passkeys_for

name: MedgeClaw biomedical assistant
title: xjtulyc/MedgeClaw (Score: 521 star in 20 hours)
body: MedgeClaw is an AI-powered biomedical research assistant built on OpenClaw and Claude Code, integrating 140 K-Dense scientific skills for bioinformatics, drug discovery, and more. Link: github.com/xjtulyc/MedgeClaw
